recipe.name: Apple 2 Morrow
recipe.notes: I'm making up this title about 50%.  I can make out "Apple" and then maybe its a Z or a 2 or an equals sign and then maybe "Mor...." or "Nor...."   Use of pencil has not improved the archiving process, nor has the rather hurried hand."Apple 2 Morrow" makes it a pleasant play on the later-family name.
recipe.preparation: Melt butter in an 8-10 inch square pan at 350F.  Mix flour, 3/4 cup sugar, salt, add milk and beat well.Pour batter into hot butter -- do not stir.  Scatter fruit on top of batter and sprinkle with additional sugar.  Bake 50 minutes or until golden brown.
